title: Teaser: WorkLife Season 2
description: Work doesn't have to suck; science says so. Take a trip inside the minds of expert networkers and Olympic champions, an Oscar-winning director and an office-politics whisperer — who've all mastered ways to make work more creative and more fun.
itunes:subtitle: The science of making work not suck
author: podcasts@ted.com (TED)
itunes:author: TED
itunes:summary: Work doesn't have to suck; science says so. Take a trip inside the minds of expert networkers and Olympic champions, an Oscar-winning director and an office-politics whisperer — who've all mastered ways to make work more creative and more fun.
